data.field:
How do I log out?

Assuming you have not disabled the navigation menu under the title bar via your [User Settings], the very first link in the list will say "Log Myself out". Click that to log out.

Similarly, if you have the [About the Leftovers Nodelet|Leftovers Nodelet] enabled via your [id://25185], the link is there.

If you're reading this node and you want to log out now, then here's the link for you convenience: [href://?op=logout|Log out now].

Of course, none of this makes sense unless you are [id://156909|logged in].
